list.name: outlier-detection-lof
list.description: Outlier detection based on Local Outlier Factor. This algorithm is implemented by Christiane Engles

input.name: choice
input.note: a radio choice. Users will choose either 'full output' or 'partial output'

input.name: delimiter
input.note: User can specify the delimiter of CSV file. The default value is ','

input.name: quotechar
input.note: User can specify the quotechar of CSV file. The default value is '|'

input.name: min population size
input.note: Minimum population size for a sub-population in the lattice.

input.name: threshold
input.note: Threshold for outputting an item as outlier (in a subpopulation).

input.name: threshold average
input.note: Threshold for outputting an item as outlier (average outlier score).

input.name: number of outliers
input.note: compute densities of each points, sort them, the first <n> numbers will be considered as outliers

input.name: k
input.note: LOF method specific parameter specifying the number of neighbors used to calculate the local densities.

output.name: json
output.note: the csv file with the name <csv file name> is located at '/static/output/' at the server side
